original_text: And he cried unto the man of God that came from Judah, saying, Thus saith the Lord, Forasmuch as thou hast disobeyed the mouth of the Lord, and hast not kept the commandment which the Lord thy God commanded thee,
korean_text: 그가 유다에서부터 온 하나님의 사람을 향하여 외쳐 이르되 여호와의 말씀에 네가 여호와의 말씀을 어기며 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 내리신 명령을 지키지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: And he cried unto the man of God
Forasmuch as thou hast disobeyed the mouth of the Lord
and hast not kept the commandment
which the Lord thy God commanded thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와가 네게 명한 그 계명을
